section.title: Yate - Yet Another Telephony Engine (includes SIP to H.323 translation)
Yate Server
section.screen: cd /usr/local/src/ git clone https://github.com/yatevoip/yate.git cd yate/ ./autogen.sh ./configure make make install-noapi

[root@testing yate]# cp packing/rpm/yate.service /etc/systemd/system/
vim /etc/systemd/system/yate.service
ExecStart=/usr/bin/yate -d -p /var/run/yate.pid $OPTS
改为
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/yate -d -p /var/run/yate.pid $OPTS
[root@testing yate]# echo "/usr/local/lib" > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/local.conf [root@testing yate]# ldconfig [root@testing yate]# yate -V Yate 6.4.1 devel1 re137d739519b25cc146bd5d9568238072be1b386
